text: Lotfollah Dezhkam (Persian: ) is the Representative of the Supreme Leader in Fars province, Imam of Friday Prayer of Shiraz and the Representative of Fars in Assembly of Experts. == References == Category:Representatives of the Supreme Leader in the Provinces of Iran Category:Iranian ayatollahs Category:Descendants of Shia Imams Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jahrom
title: Lotfollah Dezhkam
